function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 among construction workers","Impact":"Shortage of specialized labor and key personnel, disruptions to project timelines","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, provide regular testing and vaccination, promote remote work where possible","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening devices, remote project management tools","People":"Construction workers, project managers, site supervisors","Owner":"Construction organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Reduced investment and government spending on construction","Impact":"Economic hardship for construction organizations, market disruption, job losses","Mitigation":"Government stimulus packages, financial support for SMEs, incentivizing shovel-ready projects","Technologies":"Digital financial aid platforms, economic forecasting models, project cost estimation software","People":"Construction business owners, workers, government policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies, construction organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in the construction industry due to the pandemic","Impact":"Risk aversion, delay in project decision-making, reduced innovation and growth","Mitigation":"Clear communication of government policies, promoting risk management strategies, fostering industry collaboration","Technologies":"Collaborative project management platforms, virtual communication tools, data analytics for risk assessment","People":"Construction project decision-makers, industry stakeholders, policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies, construction organizations"}]}
